Welcome

We are the most unique custom-made business in Brisbane and Australia since we offer the widest range of custom made formal and wedding dresses. You can either choose from our in-house collection or email us with the dream dress you want. We can make it fit perfectly for you. We also get inspirations from haute couture collections and celebrities' dresses around the world and convert these ideas into your dream dress. We are available for video chat for customers outside Brisbane, Australia for face to face consultation and measuring sessions. Almost all of the styles featured in our website are real dresses worn by our real customers for their formal and wedding so you can see how well our dresses fit.
